MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Broomhouse Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08:21pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:15pm on Thursday, 10th December 2020.
